trans-unit.source: Represents the activity class used to handle an <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> of the type specified by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType"></xref> property.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
The user-defined name of the activity.
activityName is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that is being handled by this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> associated with this instance.
`null` is returned if the activity did not handle any exceptions.
Gets and sets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the exceptions to be handled by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref>.
Exceptions of the type derived from the type specified in <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType"></xref> are also handled.
This property must be set to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity>.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the associated <xref href="System.Exception"></xref>.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType"></xref> property.
This property is read only.
Provides a value that indicates whether this instance can filter on the specified <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
The specified <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
The value that determines whether an exception is raised on an error.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> can be filtered; `false` otherwise.
Gets the filter description associated with this instance.
The filter description associated with this instance.
Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
The object that raised the event.
The previously typed event arguments.
Returns the access type for the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
An object that implements <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.
Returns the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
An object that implements <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
The for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.
